name: Dinos-Cops
description:
Genre: beat’em up + shooter

Face the crime in Dino City with the pair of Cops, Roger and his Mother-in-law Dona Dina.

Controls: Move: AWSD ou Arrows atacar: Click left Mouse atirar: Click Right Mouse Exit: press Esc key

Credits:

lfreinoso (@lfreinoso) , saulodaniel (@saulodaniel) , and Ric-Luiz (@ric-luiz)
